description: Text fields let users enter and edit text.

bottomLeftInfo.description: Information text that located in bottom left side of iput element.

bottomLeftInfoEnable.description: If `true`, the bottomLeftInfo will be showed.

bottomRightInfo.description: Information text that located in bottom right side of iput element.

bottomRightInfoEnable.description: If `true`, the bottomRightInfo will be showed.

defaultValue.description: The text string to use for the default value.

disabledCounterCharacter.description: Character that is not involved in counting operation.

errorStyle.description: Styles applied to the input element in error state.

errorText.description:
Message to display when the input is in an error state.
 When this is present, also visually highlights the component as in error.

floatingLabelStyle.description: The style object to use to override floating label styles.

floatingLabelText.description: The content to use for the floating label element.

formControlStyle.description: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

fullWidth.description: If `false`, the field receives the property width 100.

helperText.description: The content to use for the helper text element.

id.description: The id prop for the text field.

inlineGridMode.description: If `true`, the component transforms itself into grid mode

inputAlign.description: Aligment of text in input element.

inputProps.description: Attributes applied to the input element.

inputStyle.description:
Override the inline-styles of the TextField's input element.
When multiLine is false: define the style of the input element.
When multiLine is true: define the style of the container of the textarea.

maskedMaxLength.description: Maximum character count of masked input element.

maxLength.description: Maximum character count of input element.

multiLine.description:
If true, a textarea element will be rendered.
The textarea also grows and shrinks according to the number of lines.

onChangeSync.description: Callback function when input changed sync.

onKeyDown.description: Callback function when input key down.

onKeyUp.description: Callback function when input key up.

prefixText.description: Shows prefix text of input element text.

rows.description: Number of rows to display when multiLine option is set to true.

rowsMax.description:
Maximum number of rows to display when
multiLine option is set to true.

showClearButton.description: Shows clear button on the right side of component.

showCounter.description: Shows counter on the right bottom info.

suffixText.description: Shows suffix text of input element text.

textSelection.description: Sets the start and end positions of the current text selection

timerDuration.description: Timer that shown in right bottom info by seconds

type.description:
Specifies the type of input to display
such as "password" or "text".

underlineShow.description: If true, shows the underline for the text field.

value.description: The value of the text field.
